entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
